branchCategory.name: Dust & Drip Proof IP65
branchCategory.description: <p>The X5 option, available for the LEY series in sizes 25 and 32, is a dust and drip proof specification equivalent to IP65. For DC motor models, the spec is achieved by enclosing the motor in a sealed aluminum cover with a special cable connector, and pairing the rod with a scraper and lub-retainer. Additionally, the body extrusion includes a vent hole and fitting to balance internal pressure so that dust and water are not drawn in.</p>

branchItem.name: LEY-X5, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, Dust/Drip Proof (Step Motor: Servo 24VDC; Servo Motor: 24VDC)
branchItem.description: <p>The X5 option, available for the LEY series in sizes 25 and 32, is a dust and drip proof specification equivalent to IP65. For DC motor models, the spec is achieved by enclosing the motor in a sealed aluminum cover with a special cable connector, and pairing the rod with a scraper and lub-retainer. Additionally, the body extrusion includes a vent hole and fitting to balance internal pressure so that dust and water are not drawn in.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Same features and performance as standard LEY, plus: <LI>IP65 environmental rating <LI>Lube-retainer retains grease oil film on rod <LI>Sealed aluminum motor cover <LI>Sealed cable connector </LI></UL>
